channel.title: Error Connecting Whilst Loading Client
channel.description:
When I'm trying to run the client that I am co - owner on - it just says "error connecting, please report." He showed me a video, and sent me screenshots proving it works for him and 2 other people that play. I also can run other clients, for instance my server, - the client and all. I have the client, and i have the orginal cache, named erasedpkz, and the custom one, prodsempirecache, so they're both extracted in my C drive, and they aren't conflicting because I tried removing one or the other from there, and putting back after trying to run again, and it still doesn't work.
Apologies if this sounds confusing, but please help me. I have JDK, and yea like I said, I can run any other client.
P.S. Yes it does open, but then gives me the error, or opens a black screen that says, error while running prodsempire blablabla, try these steps to fix this, like it does for the mopar webclient. but this is a download client.
Yep, help me.

item.title: Error Connecting Whilst Loading Client
item.dc:creator: @obabygirl obabygirl
item.description:
@obabygirl wrote:

When I’m trying to run the client that I am co - owner on - it just says “error connecting, please report.” He showed me a video, and sent me screenshots proving it works for him and 2 other people that play. I also can run other clients, for instance my server, - the client and all. I have the client, and i have the orginal cache, named erasedpkz, and the custom one, prodsempirecache, so they’re both extracted in my C drive, and they aren’t conflicting because I tried removing one or the other from there, and putting back after trying to run again, and it still doesn’t work.

Apologies if this sounds confusing, but please help me. I have JDK, and yea like I said, I can run any other client.

P.S. Yes it does open, but then gives me the error, or opens a black screen that says, error while running prodsempire blablabla, try these steps to fix this, like it does for the mopar webclient. but this is a download client.

Yep, help me.
